algorithms.imageProcessing

Class CurvatureScaleSpaceContour

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.CurvatureScaleSpaceContour

  • public class CurvatureScaleSpaceContour
extends java.lang.Object
    class holding data for a contour for an edge in a scale space image. The class holds the peak of the contour. It also carries information to help identify the peak in the original image from which the edge was extracted. Note, that might be 2 points (the left and right of the peak). Also note that the peak sigma's real location is relative to an image which has been convolved with a Gaussian and so the exact location is not the same. The coordinates provided are useful for debugging.
    Author:
    nichole
